title: Excellent stay in a beautiful location - Review
text:
Upon arrival we were greeted by the extremely courteous staff which kept our luggage as the room was not ready. Later during the day the receptionist gave us a tour of the hotel.
The room was medium sized and very well decorated though it could get more natural light. The bed and cushion were really comfortable. The bathroom had a modern shower with very pleasant pressure and several toiletries.
There was a small modern swimming pool downstairs with sauna and hammam perfect to relax and unwind after a long day. The spa personnel was very warm.
The breakfast was served until 11 with plenty of choices including homemade products perfect to start the day.
I highly recommend going to this hotel which is a perfect mixture of modern and traditional. The district is really nice and gives a more typical view on Paris
